document_data.name: Tathtaklo Phaerdinzer
document_data.mainbody: '''Tathtaklo Phaerdinzer''' was a shopkeeper of [[Berdusk]] in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a prominent member of the [[Phaerdinzer]] clan.
document_data.Appearance & Personality: He acted and looked like a shopkeeper rather than a mage.
document_data.Activities: As of {{yearlink|1370}}, he sold the discards of adventurers at the [[Shining Sword]], a shop in Berdusk. Sometimes, his wares were magical, but even those he crafted himself possessed only minor enchantments, including sometimes ''[[everbright]]'' and ''[[blueshine]]'' weapons, or glowing ones.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The Harpers took a keen interest in his store from the beginning, suspecting foul play in his sourcing of wares or in the owner. However, they eventually lost interest, as he only created small and subtle enchantments.
